scripts.build: node scripts/check-env.js && node scripts/check-assets.js && next build
scripts.dependency-check: echo "Checking for unused dependencies..." && npx depcheck --ignores='@types/*,autoprefixer,postcss,tailwindcss,baseline-browser-mapping,jest-environment-jsdom'
scripts.env-check: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const envExists = fs.existsSync('.env.local'); console.log(envExists ? '‚úÖ .env.local file exists' : '‚ùå .env.local file missing'); if(envExists){ const env = fs.readFileSync('.env.local', 'utf8'); const hasSupabase = env.includes('NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL') && env.includes('NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY'); console.log(hasSupabase ? '‚úÖ Supabase environment variables found' : '‚ùå Supabase environment variables missing'); }"
scripts.sincronizar:limpar: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Remove-Item sync-*.log -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'Logs limpos!' -ForegroundColor Cyan"
scripts.cache:local: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next/cache/images -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'üöÄ Cache local de imagens deletado!' -ForegroundColor Cyan"
scripts.cache:vercel: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$token = $env:REVALIDATE_TOKEN; if(-not $token){ Write-Host 'REVALIDATE_TOKEN n√£o definido' -ForegroundColor Yellow; exit 1 }; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://$env:NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_HOST/api/admin/revalidate?secret=$token" -Method Get; Write-Host '‚òÅÔ∏è Vercel avisada para atualizar o cat√°logo!' -ForegroundColor Green"
